title: Extractinator
info: The Extractinator or Silt Extractinator is an item which converts Silt, Slush and Desert Fossils into more valuable items such as ores, coins, and gems. It can be found rarely in Gold Chests, Ice Chests, or other chests in the underground, and Wooden Crates. Underground Cabins in the Underground Desert also have a chance to contain an Extractinator.
stat:
